data.title: Lompoc Facts
data.text:
People Facts

Population estimates, July 1, 2019, (V2019) 42,760 Population, percent change - April 1, 2010 (estimates base) to July 1, 2019, (V2019) 0.8% Population estimates base, April 1, 2010, (V2019) 42,438 Population, Census, April 1, 2010 42,434

Age & Sex Facts

Persons under 5 years, percent 7.8% Persons under 18 years, percent 27.3% Persons 65 years and over, percent 11.2% Female persons, percent 46.0%

Race & Hispanic Origin Facts

White alone, percent 66.5% Black or African American alone, percent 4.7% American Indian and Alaska Native alone, percent 2.1% Asian alone, percent 3.9% Native Hawaiian and Other Pacific Islander alone, percent 0.4% Two or More Races, percent 7.0% Hispanic or Latino, percent 56.3% White alone, not Hispanic or Latino, percent 31.6%

Population Characteristic Facts

Veterans, 2014-2018 2,826 Foreign born persons, percent, 2014-2018 21.4%

Housing Facts

Owner-occupied housing unit rate, 2014-2018 43.2% Median value of owner-occupied housing units, 2014-2018 $293,800 Median selected monthly owner costs -with a mortgage, 2014-2018 $1,749 Median selected monthly owner costs -without a mortgage, 2014-2018 $436 Median gross rent, 2014-2018 $1,138

Families Facts

Households, 2014-2018 13,468 Persons per household, 2014-2018 3.00 Living in same house 1 year ago, percent of persons age 1 year+, 2014-2018 83.2% Language other than English spoken at home, percent of persons age 5 years+, 2014-2018 42.6%

Computer and Internet Use Facts

Households with a computer, percent, 2014-2018 87.3% Households with a broadband Internet subscription, percent, 2014-2018 80.0%

Education Facts

High school graduate or higher, percent of persons age 25 years+, 2014-2018 78.3% Bachelor's degree or higher, percent of persons age 25 years+, 2014-2018 12.7%

Health Facts

With a disability, under age 65 years, percent, 2014-2018 9.7% Persons without health insurance, under age 65 years, percent 12.6%

Economy Facts

In civilian labor force, total, percent of population age 16 years+, 2014-2018 59.5% In civilian labor force, female, percent of population age 16 years+, 2014-2018 57.8% Total manufacturers shipments, 2012 ($1,000) 108,449 Total merchant wholesaler sales, 2012 ($1,000) 12,585 Total retail sales, 2012 ($1,000) 371,913 Total retail sales per capita, 2012 $8,597

Transportation Facts

Income & Poverty Facts

Median household income (in 2018 dollars), 2014-2018 $52,543 Persons in poverty, percent 19.1%

Business Facts

All firms, 2012 2,420 Men-owned firms, 2012 1,281 Women-owned firms, 2012 800 Minority-owned firms, 2012 813 Nonminority-owned firms, 2012 1,373 Veteran-owned firms, 2012 312 Nonveteran-owned firms, 2012 1,896

Geography Facts

Population per square mile, 2010 3,659.0
